allow: Bash(time curl -s -w "\\n响应时间: %{time_total}s\\n" -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/mysql-proxy )

Bash(python -c "
import paramiko
import sys

ssh = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)

try:
    ssh.connect\(''38.175.201.34'', port=22, username=''root'', password=''kn1C9Mo9DKf5'', timeout=15\)
    print\(''=== SSH Connected Successfully ===''\)
    
    # Basic system info
    commands = [
        \(''uname -a'', ''System Info''\),
        \(''uptime'', ''Uptime''\),
        \(''df -h'', ''Disk Usage''\),
        \(''free -h'', ''Memory Usage''\),
    ]
    
    for cmd, desc in commands:
        print\(f''\\n--- {desc} ---''\)
        stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(cmd, timeout=10\)
        print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)
        err = stderr.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
        if err:
            print\(f''Error: {err}''\)
    
    ssh.close\(\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Connection failed: {e}''\)
    sys.exit\(1\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import paramiko

ssh = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
ssh.connect\(''38.175.201.34'', port=22, username=''root'', password=''kn1C9Mo9DKf5'', timeout=15\)

# Check suspicious processes
print\(''=== TOP CPU PROCESSES ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ps aux --sort=-%cpu | head -15'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== TOP MEMORY PROCESSES ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ps aux --sort=-%mem | head -15'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== UNKNOWN/SUSPICIOUS PROCESS NAMES ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(""""""ps aux | grep -E ''\(miner|kswap|kthread|xmr|crypto|\\.hidden|/tmp/|/dev/shm/\)'' | grep -v grep"""""", timeout=10\)
output = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(output if output.strip\(\) else ''No obviously suspicious processes found''\)

ssh.close\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import paramiko

ssh = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
ssh.connect\(''38.175.201.34'', port=22, username=''root'', password=''kn1C9Mo9DKf5'', timeout=15\)

print\(''=== MINER DIRECTORY CONTENTS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ls -la /dev/shm/.x/ 2>/dev/null || echo ""Directory not found""'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== ROOT CRONTAB ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''crontab -l 2>/dev/null || echo ""No crontab""'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== SYSTEM CRONTABS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''cat /etc/crontab 2>/dev/null; ls -la /etc/cron.d/ 2>/dev/null'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== SUSPICIOUS SYSTEMD SERVICES ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''systemctl list-units --type=service --state=running | grep -v ""systemd\\|ssh\\|cron\\|docker\\|containerd\\|k3s\\|1panel\\|mysql\\|redis""'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== AUTHORIZED_KEYS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''cat /root/.ssh/authorized_keys 2>/dev/null | head -20'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== RECENT LOGIN ATTEMPTS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''last -20'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

ssh.close\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import paramiko

ssh = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
ssh.connect\(''38.175.201.34'', port=22, username=''root'', password=''kn1C9Mo9DKf5'', timeout=15\)

print\(''=== MINER PROCESS DETAILS \(PID 83702\) ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ls -la /proc/83702/exe 2>/dev/null; cat /proc/83702/cmdline 2>/dev/null | tr ""\\\\0"" "" ""; echo'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== MINER PARENT PROCESS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ps -o ppid= -p 83702 2>/dev/null | xargs -I{} ps -p {} -o pid,cmd'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== NETWORK CONNECTIONS \(Miner\) ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''netstat -tnp 2>/dev/null | grep 83702'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== ALL OUTBOUND CONNECTIONS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''netstat -tnp 2>/dev/null | grep ESTABLISHED | head -30'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== KOMARI AGENT CHECK ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''cat /etc/systemd/system/komari-agent.service 2>/dev/null; ls -la /opt/komari/ 2>/dev/null'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== FAILED SSH ATTEMPTS \(last 20\) ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''grep ""Failed password"" /var/log/auth.log 2>/dev/null | tail -20'', timeout=10\)
output = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(output if output.strip\(\) else ''No failed attempts in auth.log''\)

ssh.close\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import paramiko
ssh = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
ssh.connect\(''38.175.201.34'', port=22, username=''root'', password=''kn1C9Mo9DKf5'', timeout=15\)

# Create jail.local config
config = ''''''[DEFAULT]
bantime = 1h
findtime = 10m
maxretry = 5

[sshd]
enabled = true
port = ssh
filter = sshd
logpath = /var/log/auth.log
maxretry = 3
bantime = 24h
''''''

print\(''=== CREATING FAIL2BAN CONFIG ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(f''echo ""{config}"" > /etc/fail2ban/jail.local'', timeout=10\)
stdout.read\(\)

print\(''=== RESTARTING FAIL2BAN ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''systemctl restart fail2ban && systemctl enable fail2ban'', timeout=30\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''=== CHECKING FAIL2BAN STATUS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''systemctl status fail2ban | head -15'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

ssh.close\(\)
")

import paramiko
ssh = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
ssh.connect\(''38.175.201.34'', port=22, username=''root'', password=''kn1C9Mo9DKf5'', timeout=15\)

print\(''=== CURRENT STATUS ===''\)
print\(''--- CPU & Memory ---''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''top -bn1 | head -5'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''--- Top Processes ---''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ps aux --sort=-%cpu | head -8'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''--- Miner Check ---''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ps aux | grep -E ""miner|xmr|monero|/dev/shm|stratum"" | grep -v grep'', timeout=10\)
out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(out if out.strip\(\) else ''No miner detected ✓''\)

print\(''--- Fail2ban Status ---''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''fail2ban-client status sshd 2>/dev/null | grep -E ""Currently|Banned IP""'', timeout=10\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)\)

print\(''--- Network Connections \(Suspicious Ports\) ---''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ss -tnp | grep -E "":3333|:4444|:5555|:10128|:14433"" | head -5'', timeout=10\)
out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(out if out.strip\(\) else ''No suspicious mining pool connections ✓''\)

ssh.close\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import paramiko
ssh = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
ssh.connect\(''38.175.201.34'', port=22, username=''root'', password=''kn1C9Mo9DKf5'', timeout=15\)

print\(''=== CHECK DOGECOIN MINER PROCESSES ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ps aux | grep -iE ""doge|unmineable|cpuminer|minerd|dogecoin"" | grep -v grep'', timeout=10\)
out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(out if out.strip\(\) else ''[OK] No dogecoin miner process found''\)

print\(''\\n=== SEARCH FOR DOGE-RELATED FILES ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''find /tmp /var/tmp /dev/shm /root /home /opt /usr/local -iname ""*doge*"" -o -iname ""*unmine*"" 2>/dev/null | head -20'', timeout=15\)
out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(out if out.strip\(\) else ''[OK] No doge-related files found''\)

print\(''\\n=== CHECK BASH HISTORY FOR DOGE ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''grep -i doge /root/.bash_history 2>/dev/null | tail -10'', timeout=10\)
out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(out if out.strip\(\) else ''No doge commands in history''\)

print\(''\\n=== CHECK FOR HIDDEN SCRIPTS ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''find /tmp /var/tmp /dev/shm -name "".*"" -type f 2>/dev/null'', timeout=10\)
out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(out if out.strip\(\) else ''[OK] No hidden files in temp dirs''\)

print\(''\\n=== CHECK NETWORK FOR UNMINEABLE ===''\)
stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command\(''ss -tnp | grep -iE ""unmine|doge|3333|4444"" | head -10'', timeout=10\)
out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''ignore''\)
print\(out if out.strip\(\) else ''[OK] No suspicious connections''\)

ssh.close\(\)
")
